text: Margaret of the Palatinate (German: Margarete von der Pfalz; 1376 - 26 August 1434, Einville-au-Jard) was the daughter of Rupert of Germany and his wife Elisabeth of Nuremberg. She married Charles II, Duke of Lorraine on 6 February 1393. Her maternal grandparents were Frederick V, Burgrave of Nuremberg and Elisabeth of Meissen. One of her grandchildren was Margaret of Anjou, Queen Consort of King Henry VI of England. Her children with Charles II of Lorraine included: *Isabella, Duchess of Lorraine (1400–1453), heiress of Lorraine and wife of René I of Naples *Louis (died young) *Ralph (died young) *Catherine de Lorraine (1407–1439), wife of Jacob, Margrave of Baden ==References== ==Sources== * ==External links== * MARGARETA Pfalzgräfin Category:1376 births Category:1434 deaths Category:House of Wittelsbach Category:Duchesses of Lorraine Category:14th-century German women Category:14th-century German people Category:15th-century German women Category:15th-century German people Category:14th-century French women Category:14th-century French people Category:15th-century French women Category:15th-century French people Category:Daughters of kings
title: Margaret of the Palatinate
